byline.original: Special Cable to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Commons urges Govt to speed plans; urges U S Navy to convoy ships carrying children; 500 Brit children to be sent to Dominican Repub

headline.main: U.S. URGED TO SEND NAVY FOR CHILDREN; DEMOLISHED BY NAZI BOMBS IN AERIAL RAIDS OVER BRITAIN

lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 2--The British Government was urged from all sides in the House of Commons today to speed its plans to send thousands of children to the United States for the duration of the war and if possible get the United States Navy to convoy the floating nurseries across the Atlantic.
